text: Nembe ngayangwa, “Mwenga muyaliwite tanga iyo ya Ukulungwa wa Nnu'ngu', lakini abo bi'ngi' lili, ila abo babakiyilwa kwa ngongo li'nga batange panga, galu' gagaandikilwe mulilagano lya kwai'mbu' gendatimya, ‘Mana kabalola, kanebakibone sabakilolase, na mana kabayu'wa, kanebatange sabakiyu'wase.’
